full_text: ORGANIZED 1897 TROY CO-OPERATIVE SAVINGS & LOAN ASSOCIATION UNDER SUPERVISION OF THE BANKING DEPARTMENT OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK 407-409 GRAND STREET, TROY, N.Y. TELEPHONE: ASHLEY 4-5420 OFFICE OF PRESIDENT January 10, 1974 To Whom It May Concern: This is to certify that Dr, Julian J. Wu and Joyce F. Wu have a mortgage account with us. The value of the real estate property is $50,000. The current mortgage balance is $37,494.44. Dr. Wu has had a savings account with us since March 1972. Sincerely Troy Co-Operative Savings & Loan Association Arman B. Ruynolds George B. Reynolds, President GBR/mws HOME * MEMBER LOVA SAVINGS SECURITY AND LOW INSURED SYSTEM UP CONFORMED
